text.p: Bucceleuch - (built 1993) 182,675 dwt del passing Cape Passero end Aug trip via Brazil redel Korea $20,700/$20,800 daily Yukong.
Bel Maj - (built 1990) 149,516 dwt 12.5 on 35 plus 3 del Far East Sept 12 months trading approx. $15,375 daily Cargill.
York - (built 1990) 149,513 dwt 13.5 on 47 del Dunkirk Aug trip via Seven Islands redel China $18,300/$18,400 daily Daiichi.
Antonis I Angelicoussis - (built 1989) 69,346 dwt 13.5 on 26 plus 1.25 del Far East end Aug 6/8 months trading $10,650 daily Forestships.
Chariot - (built 1987) 68,407 dwt 13.5 on 31 plus 1.5 del U.S. Gulf prompt trip and redel Aqaba $10,000 daily plus $200,000 bb Dreyfus.
Pacific Orient - (built 1984) 66,412 dwt 13 on 26 plus 1.2 del El Ferrol prompt trip and redel Philippines $12,500 daily Samsun.
Rena - (built 1981) 64,219 dwt del U.S. Gulf Aug trip and redel Sri Lanka $9,000 daily plus $195,000 bb Dreyfus.
Surmene - (built 1984) 38,888 dwt 13 on 22 plus 2 del Morocco prompt 12 months trading $8,500 daily Clipper.
